cw.calendar.settings.AddWeekday: Add a new day of the week
cw.calendar.settings.ExportCalendarHelp: Export Calendar/Events/Moons to your clipboard. This will not record the current date however.
cw.calendar.settings.MonthAbbrevHelp: What is displayed instead of the month number if the month is intercalary.
cw.calendar.settings.MonthDeleteHelp: Removes the month from the normal month numbering scheme
cw.calendar.settings.months.Name: Name
cw.calendar.settings.Title: Calendar Settings
cw.calendar.settings.weekdays.Name: Name
cw.events.AddOneTime: Add a new one time event
cw.events.DateReoccuringEvent: Enter the date and description of reoccuring events such as holidays.
cw.events.OneTimeDescription: Enter the date and description of one time events, for example an assassination.The event will be deleted after it is triggered.
cw.events.StartDayHelp: What day does the event start?
cw.misc.AboutTimeMissingHelp: The Calendar/Weather mod requires AboutTime by Tim Posney in order to run properly.
cw.setting.2ChatHelp: If true, any moon phase changes will be output to chat, displayed only to GM level users.
cw.moon.Intro: Enter the cycle length, current cycle percentage, and eclipse information for the moon(s).
cw.moon.LEclipseDesc: Enter the chance of a Lunar Eclipse on a given night.
cw.moon.LengthDesc: Enter the length of the lunar cycle from Full Moon to New Moon.
cw.moon.Name: Moon Name
cw.moon.PercentDesc: Enter the current fullness of the moon.
cw.moon.SEclipseDesc: Enter the chance of a Solar Eclipse on a given day.
cw.moon.SEclipseEventIncoming: A Solar Eclipse will occur today.
cw.moon.Title: Moons
cw.seasons.DrierOrWetter: Is the season drier or wetter than average?
cw.seasons.HotterOrColder: Is the season hotter or colder than average?
cw.seasons.SeasonColor: What color do you want to display with the season?
cw.seasons.SeasonDayStart: What day does the season start?
cw.seasons.SeasonHourBright: Enter the hour it gets bright
cw.seasons.SeasonHourDark: Enter the hour it gets dark
cw.seasons.SeasonIntro: Enter the start date and weather modifiers for each season. The Color dropdown changes the color of the weather icon for a visual indication of the season. Entering an @RollTable[] into the 'Table' will disable advanced weather generation and instead, weather will be generated via the table. Note this will disable FXMaster integration.
cw.seasons.SeasonMonthStart: What month does the season start?
cw.seasons.SeasonRolltable: OPTIONAL: Entering a @RollTable[] will disable advanced weather generation and instead, weather will be generated via the table.
cw.seasons.Title: Seasons
cw.settings.CalDispNonGmHelp: When checked, clients without GM-level permissions will be able to see the calendar displayed
cw.settings.Display24HHelp: When checked, a 24 hour clock will be used for the time display.
cw.settings.NightCycleLabelHelp: When checked, the scene will undergo a night cycle, darkening during the night and getting brighter during the day.
cw.settings.NoGlobalHelp: When checked, once the scene reaches max darkness, it will disable the scene's Global Illumination
cw.settings.playerSeeWeatherHelp: When checked, players can toggle the weather form.
cw.settings.useSanctionsHelp: When checked, moons will display if they are at High or Low Sanction. This is useful for settings like Dragonlance.
cw.settings.Weather2ChatHelp: When checked, the weather will be output to chat, displayed only to GM level users.
cw.settings.WeatherLabelHelp: When checked, if the FXMaster module is installed, it will generate weather effects such as rain and clouds.
cw.weather.climate.description.Desert: Temp: Very Hot, Humidity: Very Dry
cw.weather.climate.description.Polar: Temp: Extremely Cold, Humidity: Neutral. Adjusts Night cycle to be more extreme depending on season's temperature.
cw.weather.tracker.extreme.Hurricane: Hurricane or large amounts of flooding
cw.weather.tracker.normal.Earthquake: Earthquake, firey rain, and toxic gases today.
cw.weather.tracker.normal.LargeFreezingR: Large amount of freezing rain today.
cw.weather.tracker.normal.LightRain: Light to moderate freezing rain today.
cw.weather.tracker.normal.LightSnow: A light to moderate amount of snow today.
cw.weather.tracker.normal.Overcast: Completely overcast with some snow flurries possible.
cw.weather.tracker.normal.OvercastLight: Completely overcast with light freezing rain possible.
cw.weather.tracker.normal.Scattered: Scattered clouds, but mostly clear today.
cw.weather.tracker.normal.SunAsh: The sun is completely obscured by ash, possible ashfall today
cw.notice.Acknowledge: Got it! Don't show this again.
cw.notice.317.Title: Calendar/Weather is changing!
cw.notice.317.UpcomingChanges: In the upcoming 4.0 release of Calendar/Weather, the focus of the module is being shifted away from being a calendar and weather module to instead focused purely on the weather aspects.  This change will mean that the current calendar UI will be getting changed as well, as this module will no longer manage the calendar.
cw.notice.317.Dependency: You may have noticed that there is a new dependency - Simple Calendar.  This fantastic module manages the calendar system far better than Calendar/Weather had, and rather than compete we agreed it would be better to work with each other and build a system that utilizes it.
cw.notice.317.Recommended: If you are looking for a module to manage time tracking beyond Simple Calendar's system, then we recommend looking at SmallTime!  It present a beautifully done interface that is simplistic and easy to use.
cw.notice.317.GitLab: You can follow up on the mondule's development and submit bug report on GitLab here:
cw.notice.317.Discord: A Discord server was also set up for the module and future projects by The Bird. You can use this invite link to join:
